scripts.cleanup-files: node -e "const app = require('./server.js'); setTimeout(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3000/admin/api/cleanup-files', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_ADMIN_TOKEN' } }).then(r => r.json()).then(console.log).finally(() => process.exit(0)); }, 2000);"
scripts.file-stats: node -e "const app = require('./server.js'); setTimeout(() => { fetch('http://localhost:3000/admin/api/file-statistics').then(r => r.json()).then(console.log).finally(() => process.exit(0)); }, 2000);"
